fullText: Little of it feels original, and none of it feels necessary. But just like actual Betty Boop merchandise — the many toys, t-shirts, scrunchies and socks covered with her image –  “Boop!” doesn’t have to feel necessary; it’s fun. And the main reason for that is Jasmine Amy Rogers.
dtliExcerpt: Little of it feels original, and none of it feels necessary. But just like actual Betty Boop merchandise — the many toys, t-shirts, scrunchies and socks covered with her image – “Boop!” doesn’t have to feel necessary; it’s fun. And the main reason for that is Jasmine Amy Rogers.
